text: Philip John Belfiori (March 24, 1918 – July 3, 1957) was an American football and basketball player and coach. He served as the head football coach and head basketball coach at the University of Wisconsin–River Falls from 1952 to 1956. Belfiori played college football at the University of Minnesota. Prior to his career at Wisconsin–River Falls, was the head football coach at Stillwater Area High School in Stillwater, Minnesota, from 1940 to 1944. ==Head coaching record== ===College football=== ==References== ==External links== * Category:1918 births Category:1957 deaths Category:Basketball coaches from Minnesota Category:Minnesota Golden Gophers football players Category:Wisconsin–River Falls Falcons football coaches Category:Wisconsin–River Falls Falcons men's basketball coaches Category:High school football coaches in Minnesota Category:People from St. Louis County, Minnesota Category:Players of American football from Minnesota
title: Phil Belfiori
